Description: This floor length gown will create a shine wherever it is worn. The sleeveless silhouette has a small sheer with an oval cutout showing off a sexy back. The front of this gown shines with sequined beading that rains down from the neckline tapering off at the bottom of the gown. Perfect for an evening out or a New Year's party.
